Entries.Tue6: The ol' {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Man:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyGender}}}} was a fisher{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Man:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyGender}}}}, you know. I grew up sailing between the fern islands, living from catch to catch.#$e#The fishing life is tough, but there's something about it that keeps you goin'.
